attributes.action: Reinstate the fallen members of the dogbomb.co.uk awards thread of doom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 6 awesomtacular members of the thriving online community www.dogbomb.co.uk have had their accounts erased.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
